评论详情: The CRZ Yoga Butter Luxe collection is an absolute game-changer! The fabric is buttery soft, smooth, and feels luxurious against the skin—perfect for yoga, lounging, or everyday wear. It has just the right amount of stretch and support without being restrictive, making every move feel effortless. The leggings and tops are also breathable and moisture-wicking, keeping me comfortable during workouts. Plus, the fit is incredibly flattering and stays in place, so no need to worry about constant adjustments. If you’re looking for premium-quality activewear at a reasonable price, CRZ Yoga Butter Luxe is a must-try!

评论概述: Buy it! It’s a great Lulu dupe!
评论详情: I bought the forest green color. Beautiful color, buttery soft, stretchy & true to size. It’s the perfect dupe to Lulu It’s Rulu Cropped Half Zip. IMO it has a slightly thicker feel, which I prefer since I wear in fall/winter. This comes is way more colors than Lulu & over than half the price! I plan on buying more colors.
It’s really cute and comfortable. Looks high quality. I’m 5’1” and 120 lbs and the small fits great.

I am 5’9” and weigh 125 - I ordered a large because I have fairly broad shoulders and large chest. The Large is way too tight on me and because the top has to go over by chest, it’s more cropped than I comfortable with. With that being said, this is a darling top with stretch and super soft feel. Reminds me of my RBX work out wear. Size up a size or two. Depending on what you like.

I want this top in a few colors! Amazon recommended a small but because this is a fitted crop top I went with a medium and I’m glad I did. I like the length of the medium more. It’s really flattering and not to short. Falls about two inches below my belly button where a small in this brand hits right at my belly button. The material is so soft and comfortable. The pink I got matched the picture exactly. Will buy in more colors

The material is very thick and I love the zipper details. This is very flattering and hits me right at my waist, giving me a nice hourglass shape (I’m 5’6). This is comparable to high end athletic brands and I will be ordering it in more colors!
Such a cute and flattering workout top!! I would size down if you want look snatched, I usually wear a medium but got a size small! It’s not too tight and you can definitely move around in it!
I have a few pieces from this brand and I like them all they fit nicely and I like the color options and the styles

评论概述: Very cute but shorter than expected
评论详情: This top is warm and flattering, great for colder weather running. It is cropped and hits just below the belly button for me

评论概述: Just what I was looking for
评论详情: Great cropped fit, bought size small (5ft2 127 lb) very cute!
True to size

Tbh, I just discovered CRZ and will never turn back. This is such a good dupe for the Lululemon version. Fabric is soft and stretchy, the zipper is smooth, and I love the small details. Will continue to buy more colors as I go.  I ordered a size Small 34B 26” waist 36” hips
I’m between XS and S (can fit comfortably in both, but usually prefer S) and the S was super baggy on me. Size down!!! Wore it for a 10K - super comfy once you have the right size :)
Fits my 12 year old perfectly
Perfect workout top
I am returning this because it is very small
The fabric is excellent, the fit is as expected.  Purchased two additional colors

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: My friend and I both love Lululemon, and after we saw one of the employees wearing an athletic cropped quarter zip, we knew we had to find a dupe. And OH BOY did we!! This quarter zip is incredible soft, stretchy, and flattering. I couldn’t have asked for a better product. I’m 5’7” about 160lbs and I got a medium. Fits like a GLOVE. It’s a little on the expensive side, but sooooo worth it, especially considering Lululemon would be double the price. Highly recommend!!

I’m a diehard lululemon fan and this brand was recommended as a dupe, I got a few long sleeves and leggings to try to compare and I would have to say it’s extremely close, to the touch the fabric is very close but it’s thicker so therefore not as breathable as lululemon but for the price it’s I would say it’s  worth it. The seams on the leggings are well made and very flattering like the aligns, bottom line these are great quality on my first impression, not sure how long they would hold up compared to the “real deal” but good for their price. Will update as I use them in time.

Love this top. Feels incredibly close to a Lululemon top. Super comfy Will definitely be ordering in different colors. I weigh 156 and I’m 5’3 I ordered a large. I’m usually medium or large but I’m glad I stuck to the large medium might be a tighter fit.

I really like the color and shape of this top, it fit my torso perfectly except the chest area. I'm a 36A and this there's a little too much extra fabric at the chest area, so if you're on the smaller chest side it'll look a little off. I got the black so it's not that noticeable, but it doesn't feel smoothly due to that reason. The arm length for me and thumb hole is great, I usually always wear the thumbhole when available.
Very comfortable and fits well
Looove them. Color is true to the image and it fits great. I have 4 colors
High material quality, true size. Perfect

This shirt is a great dupe for the “It’s Rulu Cropped Half Zip” from Lululemon. The material is buttery soft, breathable, and SO comfortable. Like other reviews mentioned, the sleeves are a bit long and do reach my knuckles. Since I bought this for workouts in colder weather, I don’t mind the length personally.  The color is a muted sage green that can look almost grayish in certain lighting, but is very flattering.  I am 5’4”, ~140 pounds and I ordered a size medium which is my normal size. I love wearing it with high rise leggings.

评论概述: One of my favorite long sleeve athletic tops
评论详情: I love this top, it fits well and is good quality. I don't have the higher end name brand version of this top but I think they look similar and feels like the material would be similar.  Highly recommend if you're looking for a dupe of the other more expensive version. I've only washed this once so I can't speak to how it will hold up but it feels like it will.
I loved this shirt so much I bought 4 colors!
Feels like Lulu.. but better. Less tight on the arms and cropped perfectly so it hits my waist. I’m 5’1 by the way

I did really like this a lot! It’s super soft and comfortable. I ultimately returned it but only because I bought it with a matching skirt and returned the skirt because it was too short. I kept this another two weeks thinking I would wear it alone but I never did and I have a rule that unless it a special occasion piece if I don’t wear something in the first two weeks I return it cause I likely will never wear it.

I love this so much that I have ordered 3 colors! It is so flattering and soft. It feels expensive. I would never buy Lulu when this is available! I am 5 foot 7, 155lbs with a large chest and the medium is fitted but fits the way I want it to.

I love this athletic top! The fabric is really nice, and the stitching seems very durable! Feels like Lulu!  It does run small in my opinion. I normally wear XXS or XS athletic tops (size 2 from Lulu), size 32 small D bra, 25” waist. Size small fit perfectly in the waist, but chest was uncomfortably tight.  I exchanged for a size medium and the fit is PERFECT! The top is hits right at my high rise pants, so not too short!
The only thing I would change is no logo, but otherwise the material feels great and is super comfortable! Love it and I wore it with my lulu leggings in this photo
I bought this cus I do figure skating and it’s excellent for every sport. Track, anything!

Really good quality, super soft material, and arms long enough for a girl who has trouble finding ANYTHING that covers her wrists?  With a bigger chest, it does make the front poke out just a little, but that's the trade off, right? I'm 5'8" 125 lbs, 32DDD.  I'll be buying more colors!

I’m 5'4" and 155lbs. After reading reviews I decided to go with a medium (I'm usually inbetween medium and large), and i’m glad I did. Only down fall is the sleeves are a bit long if you don’t use the thumb holes but other that that I love the color, feel, stretch of the material and overall look. It’s not too short or too long.

评论概述: Awesome shirt with a cute cut
评论详情: I love this shirt! It fits well and true to size (I'm a 4/6 small and wearing a small). It's a modern cut and hits me right at my belly button (I'm 5'7"). It's cute, fits, and is nice and stretchy. The little zipper in the front with the collar gives a sexy touch. I just love this shirt!
Great quality, super cute, and not too cropped!
These tops are super soft and comfortable.  Right amount of fabric to stretch.  I have most colors as this is my go to remote work / dog walking top.
I love Crz yoga brand!! This top is comparable to Lululemon in my opinion for a fraction of the price. It is cropped but I sized up one so it’s not too bad. I love the brown color!

The material is amazing, super soft and buttery feeling. I got a XL, but it seems that the torso is just a smidge too short than I’d like it, always rolling up, and I understand it’s a crop top, but it doesn’t stay down even lined up in my curves. I have long arms but the sleeves are just a tad bit too long, even with my thumbs in the hand holes, still extra material around the elbow and such. Other than that I really do love this top!
El material no me gustó mucho porque ya se le hicieron bolitas aunque seguí instrucciones de lavado
Exactly like lulu for a fraction of the price. Fit true to size, the color is exactly as pictured, and the fabric is to die for. Buying in every color!!
Not for me, but that has nothing to do with the actual clothing!  I just didn’t like it on me.
The quality and material is equal to Athleta or Lululemon.  Fits like a glove and so confortable.

This sweater is extremely well made and form fitting. My wife is a petite small. 4'11" and weighs 110 pounds. This sweater accentuates her figure and is very flattering. This sweater is designed to be shape fitting.

I love this top! It is super soft inside, its cropped but not too cropped, it hits right at the top of my leggings. The sleeve length is great for us taller ladies! I deff recommend having atleast 1 of these tops in your wardrobe!
Love this top! Perfect length to wear with high waisted leggings. Sizing is true to me - I got a small and it fits comfortably (snug but not tight).
This top is so cute so flattering and it’s not to cropped! The fabric is so buttery soft I didn’t want to take it off! This brand has gained a new customer!
Feels smooth, breathable material. Goes with your curves, stays in place when you run. Love it! Gonna but it in more colors!
Nice material.
Love this cropped pullover with zipper. Ordered a medium in White and Black, received several compliments at the gym. Also great for my golf girls!
This is my go to work out Jacket!  Perfect thickness and amazing quality! I will be buying another in a different color!
Bought this top with the wide leg pants of the same color. When they arrived they are not the same color. The tone is lighter on the top vs pants.

I normally wear an 8 in Lulu tops and ordered a medium in this one as I’m 145lbs and 5’7. The fit is cropped as expected and material is soft. I haven’t yet taken it for a workout but as long as it absorbs the sweat similarly then I’ll be ordering this top in every color! Update: wore it at the gym, and it is breathable as well as absorbent of sweat. Even though i purchased gray color, it absorbed the sweat after a 3 mile run very well.
Looks great other than weird lines all over the fabric. Thought it was wrinkled from being folded, but the back had wrinkles but did not look like the front.

I recommend sizing up, I’m usually a S/M and M worked out best for me but. the sleeves were too long so I had to fold it up. Super cute but a little more cropped than I expected . Super soft, feels kind of like my lululemon align HR pants ,very flattering design will buy more as I love comfortable athleisure ! I’m 5’6” and 135 lbs for reference

评论概述: OBSESSED. I never thought I'd be so crazy about a piece of activewear til I got these!
评论详情: I absolutely love these I'm so obsessed! I got these in 7 different colors. I got the XL for a slightly looser feel usually I wear a size L (US Size 12). Perfect for working out in!
Tight and hot
Amazing Lululem*n quality. This brand seriously takes the cake. I’ve tried many cheaper brands on here that are all garbage.

This affordable jacket is great for anything active. It is the same quality as any other expensive active-wear brand and stays true to size. It cute cropped length is great and does not shrink after a wash.
I liked these so much I ordered 5 different colors

I rarely leave reviews, but man, I LOVE this top! I typically wear the Lululemon version but decided to give this a try and I am SO glad that I did. It is AMAZING quality and a fraction of the price. The fit is perfect (very true to size).
Amazing quality for the price.

I wear SM-M in tops, and since I have an athletic build, I ordered M and it fits great. Not too loose, nor too tight. I workout in it and don’t have to fuss with it at all. If you are short waisted, it covers just the top of a high waisted legging.

Very cute! Perfect cropped length for high waisted leggings, not too cropped and keeps you covered. Comparable to the lululemon version, not quite as nice but for the price i would purchase this again over the lululemon. If they made this as a simple mock neck top without the zippers i would purchase every color!!
This is a great buy! Soft material and super cute. I'm getting another color.

评论用户: Wonderful fit, and perfect for working out.
评论详情: It fits great , and is perfect for autumn/winter wear when working out.

I needed a tight cute athletic top for a trip. This  pullover/shirt feels great and isn’t too short. Great length and the sleeve can go over your thumb. This part can be rolled up once if you don’t need that. Very comfortable but holds you in. Very flattering

I loveeeeee this half zip! Is super convenient during the cold months or just when you don’t wanna wear a sports bra to the gym. This feels like the real deal (aka miss lemon) they have so many colors for an affordable price!
Loved this item! Great lulu dupe.

I’ve also received used pieces that have holes in them. I will no longer purchase this brand. Got this in large and did fit well, I do not enjoy tight clothing. Hopes this helps.
. And half my closted is lulu. Looks just as good, without paying extra for the logo
Super cute style, dreamy fabric.
I usually wear small. Got a medium and it’s form fitting still. Very nice quality and flattering!
True to size, nice workmanship.

I wasn’t expecting to love this too as much as I do. It’s a lulu lemon dupe for sure! It’s so comfortable and buttery soft. Great for workout out it is definitely sweat wicking. Wanna buy more colors!

Super comfy and soft workout jacket. Great quality and arrived net day. Fit is as expected based on size chart. No issues with the zipper as in other brands.
Liked it overall, did return it though. Not sure how long it will last, not exactly like lulu. Very cute and true to size though. Similar to Rulu long run crop

LOVE this! Perfect length… not too cropped but not long either, compliments natural curves. So soft, just like Lululemon Align fabric. Cannot beat the price for this product. Will be buying in all my fav colors.
This crop top is stylish, very flattering, very nice quality and fits the way I would expect a Women's medium to fit. The bright pink is beautiful.

Loved this! As a size medium I think it fit slightly oversized but the quality was great! Very lightweight and breathable.
